mapper.insert: insert into sai.stuinfo(name, id, email, qq, management, introduce) value (#{name}, #{id}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{management}, #{introduce});
insert into sai.ainfo(sid, level, direction, other) value (#{sid},#{level},#{direction},#{other})
mapper.select: select s.name `sname`, s.id ssid, s.email , s.qq, s.management sman, s.introduce, a.direction, a.level, a.other, l.type ltype from sai.stuinfo s, sai.ainfo a, sai.language l where s.id = a.sid and s.id = l.sid;
select count(s.id) from sai.stuinfo s where s.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sai.stuinfo set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, qq = #{qq}, management = #{management}, introduce = #{introduce} where id = #{id}
update sai.ainfo set level = #{level}, direction = #{direction}, other = #{other} where sid = #{id}
